channel.title: Quickstarts on Teiid
channel.description: Recent content in Quickstarts on Teiid

item.title: Access Data Service
item.description: Quickstarts    <    [Integration Quickstart    >    Setup    >    Define a Data Service    >    Access Data Service Open new browser with the copied OData route URL execute example OData queries and see results *** This page is a work in progress... Check back later! ***

item.title: Access Data Service
item.description: Quickstarts    <    Virtualization Quickstart    >    Setup    >    Define a Data Service    >    Access Data Service Pre-Requisites Define a Data Service Access the US States data service Video demonstrating testing the virtualization

item.title: Define a Data Service
item.description: Quickstarts    <    Integration Quickstart    >    Setup    >    Define a Data Service    >    Access Data Service Open Beetle Studio connect to MySQL database create a view joining some of your data test your data publish your data service copy the URL provided for the OData route. *** This page is a work in progress... Check back later! ***

item.title: Define a Data Service
item.description: Quickstarts    <    Virtualization Quickstart    >    Setup    >    Define a Data Service    >    Access Data Service Pre-Requisites Setup Define a Data Service Uses beetle-studio to: Create a connection to the Openshift US-States database service; Create a virtualization using the connection adding filters if required; Publish the virtualization to Openshift. Video creating a new virtualization

item.title: Integration Quickstart
item.description: Quickstarts    <    Integration Quickstart    >    Setup    >    Define a Data Service    >    Access Data Service This “Teiid in the Cloud” quickstart will lead you through integration of a data service *** This page is a work in progress... Check back later! ***

item.title: Setup for Integration Quickstart
item.description: Quickstarts    <    Integration Quickstart    >    Setup    >    Define a Data Service    >    Access Data Service Setup *** This page is a work in progress... Check back later! ***

item.title: Setup for Teiid Cloud Quickstart
item.description: Quickstarts    <    Virtualization Quickstart    >    Setup    >    Define a Data Service    >    Access Data Service Setup Minishift A Minishift installation which is available for all the major operating systems (Linux, OS X and Windows). Video installing minishift Database Service This provides a data service in Openshift which can be virtualized. The database is populated with basic tables containing USA district, city and state information.

item.title: Virtualization Quickstart
item.description: Quickstarts    <    Virtualization Quickstart    >    Setup    >    Define a Data Service    >    Access Data Service This “Teiid in the Cloud” quickstart demonstrates the virtualization of a data service Goal: A database instance exposed as OData. Setup Install minishift Configure minishift with the following services PostgresSQL DB data service Beetle Studio / Teiid Runtime / Wildfly server Define a Data Service Create a connection to the DB data service Create a virtualization of the connection Publish the virtualization Access the Data Service Execute example OData queries and see results
